LanguageData.BioferriteGenerator.stages.Bioferrite_ge: The buzz of that blasted machine will make me mad. It's like nails on a chalkboard.
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-0.label: blood rage
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-1.label: blood rage
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-1.descriptio: I'm really angry. I feel like I could hit someone.
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-2.label: blood rage
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-2.descriptio: I want to hurt something. I want to hurt something so much.
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-3.label: blood rage
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-3.descriptio: Smash everything into pieces! You all deserve it!
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-4.label: blood rage
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.blood_rage-4.descriptio: I'll destroy you! I'll kill you!
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawl.stages.cube_withdrawal-0.d: I need to see the golden cube. Just once more. Please.
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawl.stages.cube_withdrawal-1.d: Where's that cube? I miss it. I need it!
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawl.stages.cube_withdrawal-2.d: Where is my cube? Where is it?
LanguageData.DeadlifeDust.stages.deadlife_dust-1.desc: I'm breaking out in rashes from this dust. It's burning my skin.
LanguageData.DeadlifeDust.stages.deadlife_dust-2.desc: This dust stings! I can feel it in my eyes and lungs.
LanguageData.DeathPall.stages.death_pall.label: death pall
LanguageData.DeathPall.stages.death_pall_exposure.des: It smells like death. My eyes sting and the air grits between my teeth.
LanguageData.DeathRefusalSickness.stages.death_refusa: I was deadâ€¦ I died. It was cold and terrifying.
LanguageData.EntityInRoom.stages.monster_by_my_bed.de: I'll never be able to sleep with that twisted thing around!
LanguageData.FleshTentacle.stages.flesh_tentacle.desc: Get this thing off of me!
LanguageData.FleshWhip.stages.flesh_whip.label: flesh whip
LanguageData.FleshWhip.stages.flesh_whip.description: It never stops squirming. I hate it.
LanguageData.GrayPall.stages.gray_pall.label: gray pall
LanguageData.GrayPall.stages.gray_pall.description: It feels like the world is sick and dying.
LanguageData.GrayPall.stages.gray_pall_exposure.label: gray pall exposure
LanguageData.GrayPall.stages.gray_pall_exposure.descr: It feels like the world is sick and dying. The putrid air makes me want to vomit.
LanguageData.HarbingerScream.stages.harbinger_tree_sc: I've had a pounding headache ever since that tree died. I can still hear it...
LanguageData.HateChantDrone.stages.hate_chant_whisper: I hear their whispers, no matter where I am. Saying wrong things to me over and over.
LanguageData.HateChantDrone.stages.quiet_hate_chantin: I can hear them muttering, filling my mind with hatred, inside my head.
LanguageData.HateChantDrone.stages.hate_chanting.desc: Those words being screamed into me, muttered, guttural moans of rage. Inside my head. It's driving me mad!
LanguageData.HateChantDrone.stages.loud_hate_chanting: The screaming doesn't stop, the chanting, inside me, in my head!
LanguageData.HateChantDrone.stages.extreme_hate_chant: Rage in my head murderous rip the skin deserves it the black ocean terror deep...
LanguageData.ImprisonedWithEntity.stages.imprisoned_w: I'm trapped in here with that twisted thing!
LanguageData.JoyousPresence.stages.Joyous_presence.de: Wherever I go, I can feel the joyous one in the back of my mind. It makes me feel good. Very good.
This stuff messes with my head. I can't stop thinking the worst things.
LanguageData.NeurosisPulse.stages.neurosis_pulse.desc: Leave me alone! I have work to do!
LanguageData.PleasurePulse.stages.pleasure_pulse.desc: My body ripples with joy. The world is a soft and fuzzy place.
LanguageData.ReadingTome.stages.Fascinating_tome.desc: Its almost as if it's speaking out to me personally.
The hum of that devilish device grates. I feel it inside my head. What an evil piece of machinery.
LanguageData.SpokeToDisturbingMood.stages.unsettling_: An unsettling conversation made me very creeped out. Nobody should think or speak of such things.
LanguageData.SwallowedByDarkness.stages.swallowed_by_: The darkness is suffocating. I can't see or think!
Wherever I go, I can feel it watching me. It never stops.
LanguageData.UnnaturalDarkness.stages.unnatural_darkn: I am suffocated under a blanket of darkness.
LanguageData.UnnaturalDarkness.stages.unnatural_sky.d: The truth finally comes and swallows this false world.
LanguageData.VoidFascination.stages.captured_entity.d: Such a magnificent creature. So much mystery. So much power.
LanguageData.VoidPleasure.stages.void_pleasure.label: void pleasure
LanguageData.VoidPleasure.stages.void_pleasure.descri: The vibrations of reality pulse into me and soothe everything.
LanguageData.Voidsight.stages.voidsight.label: voidsight
LanguageData.Voidsight.stages.voidsight.description: The serum makes me see so much more. Connections everywhere, emotions flowing. Faces in the shadows. So much...
LanguageData.WearingDreadLeather.stages.dread_leather: I hate this stuff. It stinks.
Two dread leather items. These make me uncomfortable.
These three dread leather items make me squirm. They smell awful.
I'm covered in this horrible stuff.
